body:
diosmaden:

BONUS 1 :: BIKE

Read the comic here :: Become A Supporter To Read CH2 Early! :: Join the discord!

so excited to finally post these pieces LOL here’s the first of 3 bonus illustrations I made for the just concluded chapter 1 of my webcomic!

The bike is a BSA Bantam, which, I make zero guarantees on drawing accurately. But ! A bantam is a miniature chicken, so I thought it made a funny pun since she normally rides a giant rooster ^_^

tags: hiii i wrote a new blurb for the comic so i updated this post accordingly :)
i like this one better bc i think it makes it clearer callie is the protagonist and tempest her love interest LOL
body:
diosmaden:

Start Reading :: Latest Update :: Become A Supporter To Read CH2 Early! :: Join the discord!

And that’s it!! The last page of chapter 1 is out!! Over the coming weeks I’ll be posting the bonus illustrations I made for the PDF release, a small little bonus comic, and then some wonderful guest art I’m really excited to share!! :)

Anyway since the chapter has now concluded, I’ll go ahead and reintroduce the comic on this post!

I don’t know about you, but I don’t much fancy hanging tomorrow

The night before Callisto’s execution, a devilish pirate woman is thrown into her cell.

Suddenly, she finds herself being swept off her feet… and flung onto the back of a giant rooster?!

Click here to start reading :: Or support the comic here!

Heart of the Storm

tags: on that note tempest's TH layout has been update with new art :)
summary: And she's finally out !! An in depth character layout for Toyhou.se, featuring an interactive design inspector and whatnot......
body:
butchlinkle:


And she’s finally out !! An in depth character layout for Toyhou.se, featuring an interactive design inspector and whatnot… and a fully custom WYSIWYG editor which allows you to fill out the code without ever needing to touch the HTML!

[P2U :: £15] Inspect & Rotate on Toyhouse

reblog.tree_html:

And she’s finally out !! An in depth character layout for Toyhou.se, featuring an interactive design inspector and whatnot… and a fully custom WYSIWYG editor which allows you to fill out the code without ever needing to touch the HTML!

[P2U :: £15] Inspect & Rotate on Toyhouse

tags: <- for the callie art. i redrew it for this so its technically new LOL
body:
@screentones-webcomicresources are hosting a #MeetTheWebcomic thing on bsky today and I figured I’d post my stuffs here too even if it’s not technically being hosted here ^_^

So here’s the banner ^ and here’s the little blurb v

The night before Callisto is scheduled to be executed, a pirate woman is tossed into her cell with her…
And all of a sudden she finds herself being swept off her feet (…and onto the back of a giant rooster?)

⭐ » HeartOfTheStorm.co.uk
⭐ » ko-fi.com/harrie

And here’s the little snippets I included with it!

Heart of the Storm

Chapter 1 will be concluding very soon, so it’s a great time to catch up :)

tags: thinkin bout these portraice again. hots updated this afternoon btw
summary: The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was "draw your characters as realistically as you can," and I...
body:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!

reblog.tree_html:
diosmaden:

The challenge of the month in the comic creator server im in was “draw your characters as realistically as you can,” and I needed to do something to grease the gears after taking the majority of the month off from art, so I painted Callisto :)

» You can read my webcomic here!

» You can read my webcomic here!
